attributes.action: Stop mortgage lenders discriminating on how long you’ve had a bank account.
attributes.background:
Mortgage lenders determine financial stability by looking at how long you’ve been with your bank, among various other complex factors.

High street banks promote a switching culture, enticing customers to bank with them in exchange for money. This results in an apparent weaker financial stability.

rejection.details:
Mortgage rules are the responsibility of the Financial Conduct Authority, which is independent. 

You can find out more here:

https://www.fca.org.uk/consumers/affording-mortgage
